item.description: Saturday practice starts at 9am and runs for 2 hours.  We meet at the docks behind Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital (125 Nashua St., Boston).  There's parking available for $5.  The place is also T accessible.  The closest stops are Science Park, Charles/MGH, or North Station.  We can lock up anything you don't want to bring with you on the boat.  Dress for the weather.  It can be chilly out on the Charles.  There are places to get changed at Spaulding.  And footwear:  wear something like sandals, flip-flops, Tevas, Crocs, or you can just paddle barefoot.  We don't go swimming or anything, but paddling kicks up some spray.
item.how_to_find_us: We meet at the docks behind Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital. We'll be the group of people wearing life jackets and holding paddles.
item.why: It's fun to be out on the Charles River paddling a huge dragon boat with 21 active, fun people.
item.name: Dragon Boat Practice Session
